item.description:
Kitty Whist Night.

Hearts will be played as a backup.

At GULU

New players welcome, we will teach you how to play.
Do not be discouraged enough not to sign up on the waiting list, if full.

There is no charge for this meetup, however it is suggested that you get a drink or something else there.

Also, if you send one optional dollar to Liv and Dave and be very sure to mention "from the Kitty Whist Players" to defray Liv and David's expense running the Games site, it would be appreciated.

It is only 2-3 blocks straight from the top of the stairs at the Salem Train Station on the right.
You can almost see the witch on the bronze crescent moon statue from the station, which is outside the Gulu.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the one with the decks of cards.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Kitty Whist and Hearts at GULU in Salem
